attributes.action: We the undersigned, vote in favour of granting Full Planning Permission to the proposed Lewisham Premier Inn Hotel (DC/11/77382/X)
attributes.additional_details: This petition seeks to mobilise the support of local Lewisham residents in favour of creating a new hotel development at Kingshall Mews, 1-13 Lewisham High Street, London SE13 5AF. In the interest of successfully regenerating Lewisham, this petition calls for the support of individually viable development projects as per the appended proposal. We the undersigned register our signature in favour of the proposed Lewisham Premier Inn Hotel (DC/11/77382/X).
